questions.title: 你儿子真不幸，要参加这么多的兴趣班。
questions.answer: Your son is so unfortunate as to join so many interest classes.

questions.title: 那个老妇人气得发抖。
questions.answer: That old woman was so angry as to shake.

questions.title: 太热了，一点都不想动。
questions.answer: It is so hot as not to move any more.

questions.title: 黄山的景色太美了，吸引了成千上万的游客。
questions.answer: Mount Huang is so beautiful as to attract thousands of tourists.

questions.title: 他的声音太大，影响到了我们。
questions.answer: His voice is so loud as to disturb us.

questions.title: 那个女孩兴奋得喊哑了嗓子。
questions.answer: The girl was so excited as to shout herself hoarse.

answer.en: His behavior was so foolish as to irritate me.

title: ——玛丽为什么这么认真学习？
——她这么认真学习是为了留学。

answer.en: Why does Mary study so hard?
She studies so hard as to study abroad.
He has been silent for a long time.
He is so sad as not to say a word.

title: ——我很担心赛琳娜。
——不必担心。她非常聪明，能解决这个问题。

answer.en: Don't worry. She is so wise as to solve the problem.
